snippet: The University of Alabama said on Monday that its traditionally white sororities had been ordered to extend their recruitment efforts and increase diversity.
abstract: University of Alabama orders its traditionally white sororities to extend their recruitment efforts and increase diversity; move comes after allegations that some alumnae had pressed sororities to reject black students.
lead_paragraph: The University of Alabama said on Monday that its traditionally white sororities had been ordered to extend their recruitment efforts and increase diversity.

headline.main: Alabama: Sororities Told to Increase Diversity
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Sororities Told To Increase Diversity
